name: Trust (bicdion)
description:
• Use arrow keys to move
  • Play in fullscreen
  • Suggestion: do not read the description before playing game!

Trust is a game of, well trust. Use your intuition to guide you to 8 trust cubes, however, you have to do so within the five-minute time limit. You will encounter false imitation cubes that look similar but rather than increasing your points it decreases them. This game emulates real-life experiences people deal with when you let others into your life. You never really know what their true intentions are, you are just supposed to trust them.
